channel.title: Error when i run my client
channel.description:
[code]- Hiyascape v2 - .. Online! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:346) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main<server.java:28> [/code]
it's been doing this ever since i've added my new weapon, and then when i try to log on it just boots me off and says i'm already logged in.
and no i got no damn experience i was following my friends tutorial trying to learn something.

item.title: Error when i run my client
item.dc:creator: @pieisawesomek pieisawesomek
item.description:
@pieisawesomek wrote:

[quote=“bigh51, post:4, topic:188835”][quote author=pieisawesomek link=topic=251630.msg2106477#msg2106477 date=1205405289]

then the new weapon wasnt added properly

i have addeed it into the right spot + i put the bonuses and compiled.

what should i do i followed the guide and did everything it says.
[/quote]no, i mean, just because you “added” the code into the right spot, does not mean the code is correct. there might be a problem that lies within the code of the weapon.
i would post for help on the topic.[/quote]

oh ok i get you, thanks for your help mate.

Read full topic
item.source: Error when i run my client
